channel.title: S U S H A N T's
channel.description: Recent content on S U S H A N T's

item.title: About
item.description: Hi there, I am Sushant, a Software Engineer at Nutanix. I love problem solving and really enjoy writing code. I have 3+ years of experience working as software engineer. Here in Nutanix, I am working on ingestion of telemetry data. I am always open to new ideas and eager to learn new things. My current interests lies in distributed systems, how they work, their reliabilty and scalabilty. I also, though not often, take part in competitve programming.
